it.uniba.controller

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniba.controller.Utils

  • public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    'ENTITY'

    Class that support the Controller class in its main functions. It assigns values to the arguments and chooses the user's request. Then returns the chosen request to Controller.

    Classe che supporta la classe Controller nelle sue funzioni principali. Assegna i valori agli argomenti e sceglie la giusta richiesta dell'utente. Quindi ritorna la richiesta scelta a Controller.

      • switching

        public boolean switching(java.lang.String[] args)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException,
                         java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                         java.net.URISyntaxException
        Method that sort values from the input from command-line and control their format. If it finds an invalid format, it doesn't let the program to continue it's execution.

        Metodo che smista i valori ottenuti da command-line e ne controlla la validità nel formato. Se il metodo trova un valore di formato non valido, non concede al resto del programma di proseguire.

        Parameters:
        args - The command-line arguments.
        Returns:
        exit If the method finds a invalid input, doesn't let the program to continue.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - See stack trace for proper location.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - See stack trace for proper location.
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - See stack trace for proper location.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - See stack trace for proper location.

      • sprint1

        public java.lang.String[] sprint1()
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                  java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                  java.net.URISyntaxException

        Method that choose which Sprint 1 request to fulfill based on the data from command-line.

        Metodo che sceglie la richiesta dello Sprint 1 da assolvere basandosi sui dati ottenuti da command-line.

        Returns:
        request Contains which sprint and which user story the user choose.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - See stack trace for proper location.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - See stack trace for proper location.
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - See stack trace for proper location.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - See stack trace for proper location.
